name: French Agricultural Award Medal
obverse: Bull facing right standing on level ground. To the left of the bull is a plow and to the right is a sickle.
references: Mes Loisirs, Amusemens Numismatiques, Ouvrage Posthume de Mr. Le Comte C.W. de Renesse-Breidbach, Publ. Par Son Fils #636
description: This medal appears to be an award medal for an agricultural exhibition. No name was inscribed on the medal.
